definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † [[אִיתַי]] (Baer [[אִתַי]], exc. bef. sf., v. Baer Da 2:10)

definitions.title: subst.
definitions.body: foll. by a gen., v. BH [[יֵשׁ]]: Eg. Aram. [[איתי]] RÉS:361, S-C:Pap., Nab. [[איתי]], Palm. [[אית]], Targum Talm. [[אִית]] (Dalm:§ 44, 4), Syr. 0iyt, Sam. 0yt, Mand. [[אית]], [[עית]] (Nö:M §§ 213. 272): v. further BH [[יֵשׁ]]);—[[אִיתַי]] Da 2:10, sf. [[אִיתָיךְ]] Da 2:26 Kt (Qr [[אִיתָךְ]] K:§ 53, 2 b), [[אִית֫וֹהִי]] Da 2:11, [[איתינא]] Kt (i.e. prob. [[אִיתַ֫יְנָא]]: K l.c.), Qr [[אִיתָ֫נׇא]] Da 3:18, [[אִיתֵיכוֹן]] v:Da 3:14, v:Da 3:15;—there is (are) . . ., abs. Da 2:28 [[אִיתַי אֱלָהּ בִּשְׁמַיׇּא]] there is a God in heaven, v:Da 3:30 not by wisdom [[דִּי־אִיתַי בִּי]] that is in me, Da 3:12, Da 5:11; sq. ptcp. or adj. Da 2:26 [[הַאִיתָיךְ כָּהֵל]] art thou able. . .? Da 3:15, Da 3:17; sq. [[דִּי]], Ezr 5:17 [[הֵן אִיתַי דִּי]] if it is that, . . With neg. [[לָא אִיתַי]] (so S-C D:10 +; Targum Syr. Mand. [[לַיִת]] layt, Zenj. sf. [[לישה]] (Cooke:184); cf. sub BH [[יֵשׁ]]) Da 2:10 ... [[לָא אִיתַי אֱנׇשׁ כִּי]], Da 3:29, Da 4:32; after the subj. Da 2:11 a, Da 3:25 [[בְּהוֹן]] ´[[וַחֲבָל לָא א]]:, Ezr 4:16; sq. ptcp. or adj. Da 3:14, Da 3:18; with pleon. sf., Da 2:11 [[מְדָֽרְהוֹן]] [[עִס־בִּשְׂרָא לָא אִיתוֹהִי]].
